name: Force Subscribe Bot
description: Python based bot to Force Users to Join a channel.

WELCOME_MSG.description: The welcome message to display. Can be formatted with {mention}, {title}, {fullname}, {username}, {name}, {last}, {channel}.

WELCOME_NOT_JOINED.description: The welcome message to display if user hasn't joined the channel. Can be formatted with {mention}, {title}, {fullname}, {username}, {name}, {last}, {channel}.

ON_JOIN.description: True/False. To configure if user must be muted directly on joining

ON_NEW_MSG.description: True/False. If the user must be muted on sending a message without being in the channel.
